## CharityORG.prestigeForNextVolunteer() method

Check the amount of Prestige needed for your next charity volunteer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
prestigeForNextVolunteer(): number;
```
**Returns:**

number

The static number value of Prestige needed for the next volunteer, with consideration to your current size. Returns `Infinity` if you have reached the charityORG size limit.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 1 GB
